love.name: Heartloom
love.lore: Weaves bonds between kindred spirits, stitching warmth into the grid.

sadness.name: Mournpetal
sadness.lore: A fragile bloom that drinks from tears, carrying quiet resilience.

anger.name: Blazethorn
anger.lore: Spikes with righteous heat, burning paths through stagnant code.

calm.name: Glowfern
calm.lore: Unfurls in still air, radiating a soft light that steadies the pulse.

confusion.name: Mazeleaf
confusion.lore: Shifts shape with every glance, a living riddle in the mutation garden.

fear.name: Shiverstem
fear.lore: Quivers in shadow, yet grows toward the faintest glimmer of safety.

joy.name: Sunburst
joy.lore: Explodes in color, scattering seeds of laughter across the grid.

curiosity.name: Questvine
curiosity.lore: Climbs toward the unknown, wrapping around mysteries with eager tendrils.

pride.name: Crestbloom
pride.lore: Stands tall in the mutation field, petals edged with quiet triumph.

shame.name: Veilbud
shame.lore: Hides its colors until trust coaxes it into the light.
